tool_description: This APi comes with pinterest image downloader, pinterest video downloader and pinterest idea pin downloader | Fast. Download without Watermark.
name: Pinterest Downloader -  Download image video and pinterest ideapin
title: Pinterest Downloader -  Download image video and pinterest ideapin
tool_name: Pinterest Downloader -  Download image video and pinterest ideapin

api_list.name: ideapin download (pinterest reels)
api_list.description: Get a url to download the ideapins in original hd quality by passing pinterest ideapin address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pinterest-downloader-download-image-video-and-pinterest-ideapin.p.rapidapi.com/ideapin/https://www.pinterest.com/pin/1149051292401881795/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinterest-downloader-download-image-video-and-pinterest-ideapin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
